item.title: OpenAI says ChatGPT service has recovered after hours-long outage
item.description: OpenAI said service to its application programming interface, ChatGPT and Sora had been restored after not working for hours.

item.title: ServiceTitan prices IPO at $71, above expected range, after slow stretch for tech offerings
item.description: ServiceTitan said on Wednesday that it priced 8.8 million shares at $71 a piece in its initial public offering.

item.title: Facebook, Instagram and other Meta apps go down due to 'technical issue'
item.description: Facebook, Instagram and other Meta apps are down due to a "technical issue."
